text: Ri Jun-Il (Hanja: 李俊一,, born 24 August 1987) is a North Korean professional footballer who currently plays as a defender for Sobaeksu in DPR Korea League. ==Club career== Since 2008, Ri Jun-Il plays for Sobaeksu in the DPR Korea League. ==International career== Ri has been a part of the National team since 2008, and has won 36 caps, scoring no goal. He is also part of the Korean defence that qualified for the 2010 FIFA World Cup in South Africa.
